Cherrycake\Response

Response

Class that represents a response to a client. Mostly used by the Output module.

    Synopsis

    class Response {
    • // members
    • protected  $contentType;
    • private boolean $headers = false;
    • private integet $code = RESPONSE_OK;
    • private boolean $url = false;
    • private string $payload = null;
    • // methods
    • public void __construct()
    • public void addHeader()
    • public void setCode()
    • public void setUrl()
    • public void setPayload()
    • public void appendPayload()
    • public void prependPayload()
    • public void emptyPayload()
    • public string getPayload()
    • public string getPayloadForClient()
    • public string getContentType()
    • public void send()
    • public void addResponseHeader()
    • public void sendHeaders()
    }

    Members

    private

    • $code — Cherrycake\integet
    • $headers — array
    • $payload — string
    • $url — string

    protected

    • $contentType — integer

    Methods

    public

    • __construct()
    • addHeader() — Adds a header to be sent to the client
    • addResponseHeader()
    • appendPayload() — Appends the given payload
    • emptyPayload() — Empties the payload
    • getContentType()
    • getPayload()
    • getPayloadForClient() — This method is intended to be overloaded if other types of Responses need to treat the payload in some way before sending it to the client. For example, generating a JSON string from the variable stored as payload.
    • prependPayload() — Prepends the given payload
    • send() — Sends the response to the client
    • sendHeaders() — Sends the headers to the client
    • setCode() — Sets the code
    • setPayload() — Sets the payload
    • setUrl() — Sets the url
